# Using the deprecated spice.branchCheckout.trackUntrackedPrompt option
# logs a deprecation warning and applies expected behavior.

as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2026-02-14T15:00:00Z'

cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'
gs repo init

git checkout -b feature
git add foo.txt
git commit -m 'Add foo.txt'

git checkout main

git config spice.branchCheckout.trackUntrackedPrompt false

# Enable interactive mode, but don't expect a prompt.
env ROBOT_INPUT=$WORK/robot.golden ROBOT_OUTPUT=$WORK/robot.actual
gs branch checkout feature
cmp $WORK/robot.actual $WORK/robot.golden
stderr 'trackUntrackedPrompt is deprecated'
stderr 'branch not tracked'
